messages.subject: Northeast Unschooling Conference Earlybird deadline extended
messages.msgSnippet: We had a technical glitch and quite a few people were unable to complete their registrations for the Northeast Unschooling Conference by the Early Bird
messages.messageBody:
We had a technical glitch and quite a few people were unable to complete
their registrations for the Northeast Unschooling Conference by the Early Bird
deadline. Therefore, I'm extending the deadline to March 13th.

If you know anybody who would enjoy the conference, please pass along the
information. In addition to our amazing presenters, we have many of our friends
coming. It's shaping up to be a fun conference.

Kathryn Baptista, Conference Coordinator

Come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference, Memorial Day Weekend, May
26-28, 2006 in Peabody, Massachusetts! www.NortheastUnschoolingConference.com



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
